item.title: Aether Spire: The Self-Sustaining Tower That Breathes Clean Air into Cities
item.description: Introducing the Aether Spire—an autonomous, wind-powered tower that filters city air and powers itself with embedded turbines. Its not just a building—its an atmospheric engine for urban rebirth.

item.title: Small Blades, Big Change: The Micro Windmill Revolution
item.description: Why build giant windmills in remote deserts when we can fill our neighborhoods with beautiful, modular, and functional wind art? Micro and medium windmills could be the foundation of a decentralized energy grid—and the canvas for a new generation of civic creativity.
